headline: Hershey to raise candy prices by double digits amid elevated cocoa costs
summary: The Reese’s maker said the “unprecedented cost” of the commodity is impacting many of its top sweet brands.

headline: Chocolate cravings are about to be costlier as Hershey’s confirms price increases are on the way
summary: Tariffs, however, are not to blame this time.

raw.summary: Tariffs, however, are not to blame this time.

headline: Kraft Heinz (KHC) Expected to Beat Earnings Estimates: Can the Stock Move Higher?

headline: US court dismisses child-labour claims against cocoa importers
summary: The appeals court found there was no link between the plaintiffs' forced labour and the importers.
